attributes.action: Make David Cameron to attend Rio World Summit 2012
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron has stated he wants to be part of the Greenest government yet, yet when the opportunity arises for him to make a difference at the world summit 2012 in Rio in June he fails to step up and isn't attending due to the Queens Jubilee, the world's future is more important than the Jubilee. This petition is to make David Cameron attend the World Summit
